title: 客户端崩溃问题
author: AB9551210
txt_content:
{:10_492:}就是服务器正常开启，（有mod）然后用客户端进服务器后客户端就崩溃了，客户端开启时没崩溃而且进单机好好的没崩溃，进服务器就卡住后面崩溃了。
代码如下：

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking entity

A full error report has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\客户端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-04-09_18.52.52-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.txt_content: 没见过此类错误= =应该是客户端运行上的一些故障吧
